en:
Yeah, of course!
They're usually great for just completely
immersing yourself.

Aah... I always love how I'm able to imagine a
story's scenery from just letters alone...

...then a movie adaption comes along and it
turns out your vision totally differs from
the movie makers'!

But isn't that what's so great about books?
Everyone visualises things differently, after
all!
S-Sorry... I kinda lost myself there, <w>haha...</w>

Hey, you should stop by every once in a while!
I'll tell you about the things I'm reading.
